components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
Since the upgrade to Titanium Studio 3.1.2, the console output of Ti.API.error and Ti.API.info stopped working (only) in debug mode. (I do get console output in normal run mode.) I only get to see the info messages up to "Application started".
The issue happens with ios6 as well as ios7.
All other debugging functionalities (setting breakpoints, viewing variables) are working fine...
I get this issue after upgrade but also after a complete reinstall (after removing all Titanium related directories).
Also removing the build and resource directories doesn't change anything.
fields.summary: Console output stopped working after upgrade to Ti Studio 3.1.2
fields.environment:
MacBook pro Retina - OSX Mountain Lion
Titanium Studio, build: 3.1.2.201308091617

comments.body:
This looks to be a duplicate of TISTUD-5283. We are investigating.

Thanks.
